channel.title: Downloading New Server's?
channel.description:
Okay, so i'm not new to Private Server's, But i've gotten a new Laptop Lately, And i've tried to download a few server's, But when i Extracted/Run etc... I can play the server for around 30 second's, Then the whole Client close's, Any Idea what this might be? And how i can stop it? :confused:
Also, i'm using Windows 7 64-Bit laptop, if that help's anyone at all, Thank's. :)
~g1bbo0o0o~

item.title: Downloading New Server's?
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

You will also need 64-bit Java I believe, so make sure you have the correct Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading New Server's?
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Its the client.

See, in the batch file for run, the client runs a 32-bit graphics setting. You need a 64-bit batch file…

So edit the old batch file and put this in there:

@echo off
cd Files
title YOUR SERVER NAME
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m
exit

This should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading New Server's?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

xxpkpurexx:

well u gotta change the words in ur run documnet i know this isnt much help but look for servers that have more then 2 worlds or 2 types hosting same ip and use the 1 that says win 7/vista

This makes no sense, nor does it help.

The clients are not working correctly because they are not 64-bit programs.
Most clients are 32-bit, so I suggest searching for a tutorial on how to play on Windows 7

Read full topic
